title: Champion Idea: Shanna, The Haunted Assassin
body:
**Stats**
Health: 510 (+85)
Health Regen: 5 (+0.6)
Mana: 400 (+35)
Mana Regen: 6.2 (+0.9)
Attack Damage: 69 (+4)
Attack Speed: 0.650
Movement Speed: 340
Armour: 28 (+6)
Magic Resist: 20 (+4)
Range: 175

**Roles: **Top Bruiser(AD)/Support Tank

**Abilities**

*Passive:* (Spirit of Gruul): Every time Shanna basic attack or deals damage with a spell she gains 1 stack of Spirited. At 9 stacks, she becomes Spirit Empowered.

The Spirit's of Gruul last 5 seconds.

Spirit Empowered Basic Attack: Gains +325 range and will instead summon a Spirit of Gruul behind the target, dealing 35/55/75/95 (+25% Bonus AD) magic damage. The Spirit can be right clicked on to restore 5% of Shanna's maximum mana. 

**Q.: **(Throwing Knife): Shanna throws a knife in a line that deals 60/80/100/120/140 (+45% Bonus AD) physical damage to the first target hit. If it passes through a Spirit of Gruul, the knife becomes Enhanced, gaining +70% speed, restores 3% of Shanna's maximum mana and deals 60/80/100/120/140 (+25% AP) magic damage in an area around the knife when it hits a target or reaches the end of its path. This also consumes the Spirit

**Spirit Empowered**: If Shanna is Spirit Empowered when she throws the knife, if it hits a target, it also creates a 400 unit area around the target where a Spirit Empowered Basic attack can be proxy cast from. i.e. 400 units around the area, Shanna can basic attack a target in that range to summon a Spirit of Gruul behind them. Only one of these areas can exist at a time.
CD: 8
Mana: 60

**W.: **(Shadow Flash): After a 0.7 second cast, Shanna appears behind a target enemy champion. If the target is a Spirit of Gruul, the cast time is reduced to 0.2 seconds and moves the spirit to where she started the cast.

**Spirit Empowered:** Slows all nearby enemy units when she arrives by 35% for 3 seconds. If she targetted a Spirit of Gruul, she also gains gains +15% movement speed for 1.5 seconds.
CD: 23/22/21/20/19
Mana: 80

**E.: **(Soul Strike): Shanna's next basic attack will deal +30/40/50/60/80 (+75% Bonus AD) bonus physical damage and slow the target by 90% which decyas over 1 second. Any active Spirits of Gruul will also deal 30/40/50/60/80 (+45% Bonus AD) magic damage to the nearest enemy unit (priority champions) within 200 range. Spirits of Gruul also retain the damage they dealt as stacks of Soul Nourish. If the Souls of Gruul are consumed in any way, they heal Shanna equal to the number of stacks of Soul Nourish.

**Spirit Empowered: **Shanna restores 3% of her maximum mana for each Spirit of Gruul active. 
CD: 16
Mana: 70/75/80/85/90
Health Cost: 15% Max Health

**R.: **(Flash Speed): For the next 5 seconds, Shanna gains +100/120/140% attack speed and her passive is reduced to 6 basic attacks or damaging spells rather than 6. Her Throwing Knife will also travel +70% faster, but this does not stack if it is Spirit Empowered. She also gains a maximum cap of 3 Spirits of Gruul active at a time.
CD: 120/110/100
Mana: 135
